refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: getallheaders is an alias for apache_request_headers. It will return an associative array of all the HTTP headers in the current request. Please read the apache_request_headers documentation for more information on how this function works.

note.para: In PHP 4.3.0, getallheaders became an alias for apache_request_headers. Essentially, it was renamed. This is because this function only works when PHP is compiled as an Apache Module.
From PHP 4.3.3 on you can use this function with the NSAPI server module in Netscape/iPlanet/SunONE webservers, too.
